attributes.action: support the Committee Against Child Abuse, Nepal and their attempts to extradite sex traffickers
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
At present,it costs $2000 to buy a child in a developing country - sometimes for fraudulent purposes. 

The CACA is trying to petition the UK government to find a peaceful, legal and legitimite solution to this problem.
You can help by signing the petition below.
